casebody.data:
Lawrence W. BODELL, Appellant, v. AUTOMATIC INSTRUMENT COMPANY, a Corporation, Appellee. No. 8044. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. June 28, 1939. Chritton, Wiles, Davies, Hirschl & Dawson, of Chicago, Ill., and Rice & Rice, of Grand Rapids, Mich., for appellant. Parkinson & Lane, of Chicago, Ill., and Knappen, Uhl, Bryant & Snow, of Grand Rapids, Mich., for appellee.

Before HICKS, ALLEN, and HAMILTON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

It is ordered that the appeal herein he and the same is dismissed pursuant to stipulation of counsel.
